Chibi Neko Tomu no Daibouken: Chikyuu wo: Anime adaptation of children's stories "The Adventures of Tom the small Cat" by Masumi Lino (飯野真澄) (Story) and Yumiko Imai (今井弓子) (Illustrations).
[['Nakamura, Ryuutarou', 'Director, Script, Storyboard, Series Composition'], ['Shiba, Shigeharu', 'Sound Director'], ['Kawai, Kenji', 'Music'], ['Okiura, Hiroyuki', 'Key Animation']]
